title: Score Sabotage Unleashed
outcome: Dissident citizens hack the BCI, causing wild, unpredictable swings in behavioral scores. Power balances shift as low-scorers gain advantages and trusted citizens are suddenly restricted. Paranoia, neighborhood watch efforts, and factional suspicion deepen the social crisis.

events.description: Residents notice erratic changes in their BCI scores, resulting in sudden privilege swaps. Formerly restricted citizens gain access to premium services while established elites face unexplained denials.
Neighborhood patrols form to 'verify authenticity' of high scores. Vigilante checks and arbitrary accusations fuel confrontations and distrust among residents.

The Council urgently debates biometric and manual verification at all key infrastructure, citing rampant BCI manipulation. Directorate pushes for emergency powers; Innovators resist, blaming system vulnerabilities dating back to 2023.
Rashes of digital messages urge citizens to 'trust no score.' Slogans and graffiti appear citywide, mocking the idea of a fair system. Crowds gather outside major service hubs, demanding answers.
The Council initiates a partial BCI lockdown, revoking mass access to key services for most citizens until the system can be stabilized. Panic and rationing begin in multiple districts.
